item.title: EP 763 - Squid Game: Shadowman Edition!
item.itunes:title: Squid Game: Shadowman Edition!
item.description:
Today we find out ghosts can imitate your friends, and then we investigate a spooky Shadowman encounter that ends with a Squid Game! Maybe!

Patreon 

https://www.patreon.com/user?u=18482113

Help Promote Dead Rabbit!

https://i.imgur.com/yobMtUp.jpg

“Alien Flyer” By TVP VT U

https://imgur.com/gallery/aPN1Fnw

Closing Song: "Humanity’s December"
